name: Finance.Vote
short_description: Finance.Vote is a decentralized system for enhancing the governance of crypto networks, engaging in market discovery and socially coordinated trading.
description: Finance.Vote is the consensus layer for DeFi. It is a governance platform designed to introduce quadratic voting technologies and mechanisms for price discovery to decentralised finance. The platform pushes prediction markets and DAOs into new territories, where users can earn tokens for accurate price predictions and participating in governance decisions. Finance.Vote is DeFi 2.0
